name: TimeOps
description:
Note: known bug in the HTML version that game will fail to restart properly. If you can't finish the game in one go, go ahead and download the Windows version.

As a TimeOp, you are tasked with travelling to the future to research new weapons and battle strategies. In that time, aliens have overrun the Earth, turning it into a dangerous war-torn wasteland. Shoot the aliens and learn the secrets behind their futuristic weapons and armor, but try not to die in the process.
